name: Bramar
_source: speak;Bramar;An Airbender?{w}Well, aren't you all supposed to be...{w} y'know... gone?
speak;Nelad;We are,{w} thanks to your guests over there.
speak;Bramar;I will throw them out soon enough.{w} What about you, Airbender?{br}Thought your kind didn't fight.
speak;Nelad;We didn't and because of{br}that my friends lie dead,{w} my home is ash.|{clear}What good is a vow of peace{w} when there's no one left to keep it?
speak;Bramar;And are you now seeking revenge or something?
speak;Nelad;It's not about revenge.|I just won't let them take any more.
speak;Bramar; Good enough for me.{w} I'll hold the front.You take out their archers.
